dict.string:
Key points - The app does not store or request any personal information - The app uses Google Admob and Firebase analytics to show ads - The app does not track how you use the app - Feedback emails are stored temporarily, once the issue is resolved your email will be deleted.
You can view the full privacy policy here: http://pigdogbay.blogspot.com/2018/05/privacy-policy.html
For further information contact pigdogbay@yahoo.co.uk
